snippet: In a restive part of Saudi Arabia, a show of popular anger after protests over the arrest of a cleric prompted a violent crackdown by security forces.
abstract: Thousands attend the funeral of Muhammed el-Filfil, Saudi Arabian man killed during protests in a restive region of the country’s Eastern Province; attendance is a show of popular anger that comes amid fears of a renewed crackdown on dissent.

byline.contributor: Mayy El Sheikh contributed reporting from Cairo.

lead_paragraph: In a restive part of Saudi Arabia, a show of popular anger after protests over the arrest of a cleric prompted a violent crackdown by security forces.

headline.seo: In Saudi Arabia, Thousands at Funeral of Protester
headline.main: Angry Throngs at a Funeral in Saudi Arabia
headline.print_headline: Angry Throngs at a Funeral in Saudi Arabia

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
